name: Nancy I. Reinoso Ruiz
body:
# Profile.
A motivated and enthusiastic MSc Chemistry, looking for a research and development position in the Chemical Industry. 
Strong understanding of analytical techniques and instrumentation including infrared and ultraviolet spectroscopy, GC, HPLC and GC/MS.

# Education
### MSc Chemistry  
(_2008–2012_), Universidad Autónoma de Madrid (Spain)
* Specialization in Analytical Chemistry

# Work Experience 
###BP Oil España S.A.U. 
Support Network Planning
* Management of petrol station network and Medici database.

###Advanced Telephone Services S.A. 
Administrative Secretary
* Phone support and troubleshooting to customers

# Technical Skills
* Chemical Database: ACD Labs V.6, Spartan 04, Mestrenova.
* Operating system: Windows, Linux.
* Office Tools: Word, Excel, PowerPoint
* FORTRAN

### Technical Skills
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and we’ll help you sort it out.
